titleStmt.title: A discourse of sea-ports principally of the port and haven of Dover / written by Sir Walter Rawleigh and address'd to Queen Elizabeth ; with useful remarks, &c., on that subject, by command of His late Majesty, K. Charles the Second.
titleStmt.author: Raleigh, Walter, Sir, 1552?-1618.
Digges, Dudley, Sir, 1583-1639.
Sheeres, Henry, Sir, d. 1710.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for and sold by John Nutt ...,

notesStmt.note: Also attributed to Dudley Digges. Cf. BM; DNB.
Reproduction of original in Dulwich College Library, Dulwich, England.
